nodes.bodyText: Don't know if it's worth changing now but was it discussed whether this would make more sense in the logging package vs. under dev menu?

nodes.bodyText: In the PR to store logs for the developer menu, Jameson left a comment about this: "One could argue either way. I'd say devmenu, since its the only consumer we currently expect for the plugin. If we find another use for it, we can always move it back to the more general location, later."
